body:
In order to generate a gitlab CI dynamic pipeline, you need to make sure "mirrors" keyword is defined in `spack.yaml` itself. If the mirror is in an external config file, I get an error message.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
-bash-4.2$ spack ci generate
==> Warning: included configuration files should be updated manually [files=./, ../config.yaml, ../mirrors.yaml, ../modules.yaml, ../repos.yaml]
==> Error: spack ci generate requires an env containing a mirror
```
title: Gitlab CI generator does not check included config files
